overview:
After attending College in Tampa, For the next 4 years after that, I dove into print design to work with more then over 30k different small to large companies. I also learned programming in several languages, including my favorite jQuery!

During this time, I also earned my Certification for to teach and manipulate S.E.O. (Search Engine Optimization), S.M.O. (Social Media Optimization) and S.E.M. (Search Engine Marketing) in order to help me move forward in my next ventures in life.

After an abrupt change with my families health, I moved closer to them to San Antonio, TX to work at Rackspace which is today one of the largest web hosting companies in the world.

Everyday I wake up my fuel burns my fire when I see a new client get exactly what they want, when they want it. When a client is happy I am happy. When I see work I have done on billboards, magazines, websites, and many other means of advertising, I just sit back and smile.
